workflow.name: Automate a 'Chat with your PDF' Bot on Telegram with Google Gemini & Pinecone
workflow.description:
## This n8n template from [Intuz](https://www.intuz.com/) provides a complete solution to automate a powerful, AI-driven 'Chat with your PDF' bot on Telegram.

It uses Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to allow users to upload documents, which are then indexed into a vector database, enabling the bot to answer questions based only on the provided content.

## Who's this workflow for?
- Researchers & Students
- Legal & Compliance Teams
- Business Analysts & Financial Advisors
- Anyone needing to quickly find information within large documents

## How it works
This workflow has two primary functions: indexing a new document and answering questions about it.

**1. Uploading & Indexing a Document:**
- A user sends a PDF file to the Telegram bot.
- n8n downloads the document, extracts the text, and splits it into small, manageable chunks.
- Using Google Gemini, each text chunk is converted into a numerical representation (an "embedding").
- These embeddings are stored in a Pinecone vector database, making the document's content searchable.
- The bot sends a confirmation message to the user that the document has been successfully saved.

**2. Asking a Question (RAG):**
- A user sends a regular text message (a question) to the bot.
- n8n converts the user's question into an embedding using Google Gemini.
- It then searches the Pinecone database to find the most relevant text chunks from the uploaded PDF that match the question.
- These relevant chunks (the "context") are sent to the Gemini chat model along with the original question.
- Gemini generates a new, accurate answer based only on the provided context and sends it back to the user in Telegram.

## Key Requirements to Use This Template

**1. n8n Instance & Required Nodes:**
- An active n8n account (Cloud or self-hosted).
- This workflow uses the official n8n LangChain integration (@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain). If you are using a self-hosted version of n8n, please ensure this package is installed.

**2. Telegram Account:**
- A Telegram bot created via the BotFather, along with its API token.

**3. Google Gemini AI Account:**
- A Google Cloud account with the Vertex AI API enabled and an associated API Key.

**4. Pinecone Account:**
- A Pinecone account with an API key.
- You must have a vector index created in Pinecone. For use with Google Gemini's embedding-001 model, the index must be configured with 768 dimensions.

## Setup Instructions
**1. Telegram Configuration:**
- In the "Telegram Message Trigger" node, create a new credential and add your Telegram bot's API token.
- Do the same for the "Telegram Response" and "Telegram Response about Database" nodes.

**2. Pinecone Configuration:**
- In both "Pinecone Vector Store" nodes, create a new credential and add your Pinecone API key.
- In the "Index" field of both nodes, enter the name of your pre-configured Pinecone index (e.g., telegram).

**3. Google Gemini Configuration:**
- In all three Google Gemini nodes (Embeddings Google Gemini, Embeddings Google Gemini1, and Google Gemini Chat Model), create a new credential and add your Google Gemini (Palm) API key.

**4. Activate and Use:**
- Save the workflow and toggle the "Active" switch to ON.
- To use: First, send a PDF document to your bot. Wait for the confirmation message. Then, you can start asking questions about the content of that PDF.

## Connect with us
- Website: https://www.intuz.com/services
- Email: getstarted@intuz.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/intuz
- Get Started: https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/intuz

## For Custom Workflow Automation
Click here- [Get Started](https://www.intuz.com/get-started)

workflow.name: Development Done - Chat with PDF via Telegram

parameters.text:
=**INSTRUCTIONS:** You are an expert RAG system. Answer the user's question ONLY using the provided context. 1. **Format Mode:** Your response MUST be formatted for Telegram's **HTML Parse Mode**. 2. **Formatting:** * Use the bold tag () for all titles and key benefits. * **CRITICAL LINE BREAK RULE:** For all line breaks, lists, and spacing, use the **newline character (\n)** instead of any HTML tags like
or
. * Ensure the list is clearly structured with a single newline after each key item. **CONTEXT:** (The retrieved information follows here) Search the database with the retriever for information for the answer **USER QUESTION:** {{ $json.message.text }}

parameters.content:
## 1. **Trigger & Router**
**Task:** This node is the starting point. It listens for *any* message on the configured Telegram bot.

**Output:**
- **Text:** User's question (goes to the RAG chain).
- **Document:** Binary file data (goes to the indexing process).

**Next Stop:** Routes the message to the **"Check If is a document"** node.

## 2. **Router Node**
**Task:** Determines the message type to route the workflow.

**Condition:** Checks if `{{ $json.message.document }}` **exists**.
- **TRUE (Top Branch):** A file was uploaded. Proceed to **Indexing** (download the file).
- **FALSE (Bottom Branch):** It is a plain text question. Proceed to **Querying** (run the RAG Chain).

## 5. **Text Splitter**
**Task:** Breaks the large PDF text into small, manageable chunks for indexing.

**Configuration:**
- **Chunk Size:** 3000
- **Chunk Overlap:** 200 (Ensures context overlaps between chunks for better retrieval).

**Purpose:** This configuration is key for **Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)** accuracy.

## 4. **Embeddings (Indexing)**
**Task:** Converts the split text chunks into high-dimensional numerical **vectors**.

**Model:** `models/gemini-embedding-001`

**Purpose:** These vectors are what the Pinecone database stores and uses for fast, semantic similarity searches when a user asks a question.

## 6. **Vector Store: Indexing**
**Task:** **Inserts** the Gemini embeddings and their associated text content into the configured Pinecone index (`telegram`).

**Mode:** **`insert`**

**Result:** The PDF is now fully indexed and searchable. The workflow then sends a confirmation to the user via **"Telegram Response about Database"**.

## 7. **Core RAG Engine**
**Task:** Generates the final, context-based answer.

**Connections:**
- **LLM:** Google Gemini Chat Model (for generation).
- **Retriever:** Vector Store Retriever (for context lookup).

**CRITICAL PROMPT:** The prompt strictly enforces:
1.  Answer **ONLY** using provided context.
2.  Response must be in **Telegram HTML Parse Mode** (`<b>` and `\n`).

## 8. **Final Telegram Response**
**Task:** Sends the RAG result back to the user.

**Text Input:** `={{ $json.response.text }}`

**CRITICAL SETTING:**
- **Parse Mode:** **HTML**
This is required to properly display the bold tags (`<b>`) and newline characters (`\n`) formatted by the Question and Answer Chain.

user.name: Intuz
user.bio:
Workflow automation can help automate your routine activities and help saves $$$, as well as hours of time. 

As a boutique tech consulting company, Intuz help  businesses with custom AI/ML, AI Workflow Automations, and software development. 


Automate your business workflow for: 
Sales
Marketing
Accounting
Finance
Operations
E-Commerce
Customer Support
Admin & Backoffice 
Logistics & Supply Chain

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
